data.title: Breaking News - Stream "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem" Beginning September 19 on Paramount+
data.text:
STREAM "TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM" BEGINNING SEPTEMBER 19 ON PARAMOUNT+

Paramount+ is the Streaming Home of the Turtles with an Extensive Library of Past Series and Films Plus the Upcoming New Original Series TALES OF THE TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES Coming in 2024 Exclusively to the Service

September 18, 2023 - Paramount+ today announced that the hit animated feature film TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM, will be available to stream on the service beginning Tuesday, September 19, in the U.S. and Canada. The film's availability in additional international Paramount+ markets will be announced at a later date.

After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

The film has earned over $162M in worldwide box office gross to-date, and with a 96% Fresh Rotten Tomatoes critics' score, is the best-reviewed animated wide release this year.

Presented by Paramount Pictures and Nickelodeon Movies, TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM stars Micah Abbey, Shamon Brown Jr., Nicolas Cantu, Brady Noon, Jackie Chan, Ice Cube, and many more.

TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM, a Point Grey Production, is directed by Jeff Rowe and co-directed by Kyler Spears, with a story by Brendan O'Brien and Seth Rogen & Evan Goldberg & Jeff Rowe, and screenplay by Seth Rogen & Evan Goldberg & Jeff Rowe and Dan Hernandez & Benji Samit. Based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Characters Created by Peter Laird and Kevin Eastman, the film is produced by Seth Rogen, p.g.a., Evan Goldberg, p.g.a. and James Weaver, p.g.a., and is executive produced by Ramsay McBean and Josh Fagen.

TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM is rated PG for sequences of violence and action, language and impolite material.

The upcoming Paramount+ series from Nickelodeon Animation and Point Grey Pictures, TALES OF THE TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES, is a 2D animated series based off of TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: MUTANT MAYHEM. Reprising their roles from the film for the series are Micah Abbey, Shamon Brown Jr., Nicolas Cantu and Brady Noon as the four Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles will be challenged like never before as Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey each go it alone for the first time. Faced with new threats and teaming up with old allies, the Turtles will discover who they really are when they don't have their brothers at their sides. In addition, fans can stream even more of the Turtles with Paramount+'s vast library of episodes from the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles series as well as select films.

About Paramount+

Paramount+, a direct-to-consumer digital subscription video on-demand and live streaming service, combines live sports, breaking news and a Mountain of Entertainment(TM). The premium streaming service features an expansive library of original series, hit shows and popular movies across every genre from world-renowned brands and production studios, including BET, CBS, Comedy Central, MTV, Nickelodeon, Paramount Pictures and the Smithsonian Channel. Paramount+ with SHOWTIME, the service's cornerstone plan, is also home to SHOWTIME(R) content, including scripted hits, critically acclaimed nonfiction projects, SHOWTIME SPORTS(R) (including industry-leading SHOWTIME BOXING(R)) and films. This premium plan includes unmatched events and sports programming through the local live CBS stream, including golf, basketball and more, plus streaming access to CBS News Network for 24/7 news and CBS Sports HQ for sports news and analysis.

About Paramount Pictures

Paramount Pictures Corporation (PPC), a global producer and distributor of filmed entertainment, is a unit of Paramount Global (NASDAQ: PARA, PARAA), a leading global media and entertainment company that creates premium content and experiences for audiences worldwide. Paramount Pictures has some of the most powerful brands in filmed entertainment, including Paramount Pictures, Paramount Animation, and Paramount Players. PPC operations also include Paramount Home Entertainment, Paramount Pictures International, Paramount Licensing Inc., and Paramount Studio Group.
